long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Joyful Quotes" â€“ an uplifting extension that adds a delightful touch to your day. With just a click, receive a stream of inspiring quotes, from renowned authors and beloved figures throughout history. Let their words of wisdom and positivity wash over you, bringing a smile to your face and a spring to your step. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the Joyful Quotes Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use. The search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Privacy Policy: https://dev-spots.com/Privacy-Policy/
Terms of Use: https://dev-spots.com/Terms-Conditions/

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall


All Pictures are taken from Unsplash with a commercial license.
All quotes are sourced from https://type.fit/api/quotes.
